sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Box, Flex, Link, Menu, MenuButton, MenuList, MenuItem, useMediaQuery, IconButton, Collapse, } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { HamburgerIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons"; const Navbar = () => { const [isLargerThan768] = useMediaQuery("(min-width: 768px)"); const [showLinks, setShowLinks] = useState(false); const toggleLinks = () => { setShowLinks(!showLinks); }; return ( <> {isLargerThan768 ? ( Home About Services More Contact FAQ ) : ( } onClick={toggleLinks} bg="#F5F5F5" color="black" /> )} {!isLargerThan768 && ( Home About Services Contact FAQ )} ); }; export default Navbar;
